name: Meeka Traps
description:
Meeka Traps is a Challenge Game , it talks about a girl Called Meeka , Her Sister Was Trapped by A group Of People , They Put Her In a Prison , and meeka Wanted To Free Her , But The Way Is Very Hard , it contains A lot Of Traps , But You Have A Pen , This Pen Could Draw Ways And Walk On Them , That pen Will Help Her To Find Her Sister And Make The Way Very Easy ..
Try To Help Meeka And Save Her Sister ...!!
